Welcome to our application. By using thi: Welcome to our application. By using this app, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully.

We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated terms.

We are not responsible for any losses or: We are not responsible for any losses or damages resulting from your use of the app. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
We value your privacy. This Privacy Poli: We value your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
By using our app, you agree to the pract: By using our app, you agree to the practices described herein.
We collect data such as name, email, loc: We collect data such as name, email, location, and usage statistics to improve your experience.
Your information is never sold or shared: Your information is never sold or shared with third parties without your consent, unless required by law.
We implement security measures to safegu: We implement security measures to safeguard your data but cannot guarantee absolute security.
You have the right to access, update, or: You have the right to access, update, or delete your information by contacting our support.
Continued use of the app indicates accep: Continued use of the app indicates acceptance of this policy.
Our goal is to provide a transparent and: Our goal is to provide a transparent and fair cancellation process.
Cancellations must be requested within 2: Cancellations must be requested within 24 hours of placing the order.
Once a cancellation request is received,: Once a cancellation request is received, we will confirm via email or app notification.
If payment was already made, the refund: If payment was already made, the refund will be processed within 7 business days.
No cancellations or refunds will be acce: No cancellations or refunds will be accepted after the product has been shipped.

How can I reset my password?: How can I reset my password?
To reset your password, go to the login: To reset your password, go to the login screen and tap on "Forgot Password". Follow the instructions sent to your registered email to create a new password.
How do I track my order?: How do I track my order?
Once your order is placed, you’ll receiv: Once your order is placed, you’ll receive a tracking ID via SMS or email. You can use it in the "My Orders" section to view live updates on your delivery.
Can I cancel or modify my order?: Can I cancel or modify my order?
Yes, orders can be canceled or changed w: Yes, orders can be canceled or changed within 24 hours of placement. Visit the "My Orders" section and select the order to see modification options.
What payment methods do you accept?: What payment methods do you accept?
We accept credit/debit cards, net bankin: We accept credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and major mobile wallets. All transactions are secured and encrypted for your safety.
How do I contact customer support?: How do I contact customer support?
You can reach us through the \"Help & Su: You can reach us through the "Help & Support" section in the app. We’re available 24/7 via chat or email to assist you with any queries.
